title: A Closer Look At The Markets
itunes:title: A Closer Look At The Markets
description:
Jeffrey Cleveland, Chief Economist at Payden & Rygel, talks inflation. Aoifinn Devitt, CIO of Moneta, discusses the markets. Ryan Jacob, CIO of the Jacob Internet Fund, talks markets and investing. Ashraf Rizvi, CEO and Founder of Gilded, discusses the commodities space. Hosted by Kailey Leinz and Lisa Abramowicz.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
